ActCanada Student Loans Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Student Loans Regulations
PrecisRegulations amending the CANADA STUDENT LOANS REGULATIONS in order to continue to support making student and apprentice loans more affordable and accessible for students who need them and particularly respond to the needs of student and apprentice borrowers facing challenging life or financial circumstances.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2019-0216 Publication Date: 2019-06-26
